verses.verse: And there <S%H3212>went<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> to wife a <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>: and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> him that he was a <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H6845>child<s%>, she hid him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3391>months<s%>.

And when she <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H6845>hide<s%> <S%H3947>him<s%>, she took for him an <S%H8392>ark<s%> of <S%H1573>bulrushes<s%>, and <S%H2560>daubed<s%> it with <S%H2564>slime<s%> and with <S%H2203>pitch<s%>; and she <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H7760>therein<s%>, and laid it in the <S%H5488>flags<s%> by the <S%H2975>river<s%>'s <S%H8193>brink<s%>.
And his <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H3320>stood<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>, to <S%H3045>know<s%> what would be done to <S%H6213>him<s%>.

And the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7364>bathe<s%> at the <S%H2975>river<s%>; and her <S%H5291>maidens<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> along by <S%H2975>the<s%> <S%H3027>river-side<s%>; and she <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H8392>ark<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5488>flags<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> her <S%H519>handmaid<s%> to fetch <S%H3947>it<s%>.

And she <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H7200>it<s%>, and saw the <S%H3206>child<s%>: <S%H5288>and<s%>, behold, the babe <S%H1058>wept<s%>. And she had <S%H2550>compassion<s%> on <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, This is one of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%>' <S%H3206>children<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> his <S%H269>sister<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, Shall I <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> thee a <S%H3243>nurse<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H802>women<s%>, that she may <S%H3243>nurse<s%> the child for <S%H3206>thee<s%>?

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>her<s%>, Go. And the <S%H5959>maiden<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%>'s <S%H517>mother<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>her<s%>, Take this <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H3212>away<s%>, and <S%H3243>nurse<s%> it for <S%H5414>me<s%>, and I will give thee thy <S%H7939>wages<s%>. And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%>, and nursed <S%H5134>it<s%>.

And the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew<s%>, and she <S%H935>brought<s%> him unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and he became her <S%H1121>son<s%>. And she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Because I <S%H4871>drew<s%> him out of the <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And it came to pass in those <S%H3117>days<s%>, when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H1431>grown<s%> <S%H3318>up<s%>, that he went out unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H7200>looked<s%> on their <S%H5450>burdens<s%>: and he <S%H7200>saw<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> <S%H5221>smiting<s%> a <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%>, one of his <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

And he <S%H6437>looked<s%> this <S%H3541>way<s%> and that <S%H3541>way<s%>, and when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was no <S%H376>man<s%>, he <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>, and <S%H2934>hid<s%> him in the <S%H2344>sand<s%>.

And he went <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H8147>and<s%>, behold, two <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> were <S%H5327>striving<s%> <S%H559>together<s%>: and he said to him that did the <S%H7563>wrong<s%>, Wherefore <S%H5221>smitest<s%> thou thy <S%H7453>fellow<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Who <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H376>thee<s%> a <S%H8269>prince<s%> and a <S%H8199>judge<s%> over <S%H559>us<s%>? Thinkest thou to <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H2026>me<s%>, as thou killedst the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>? And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H403>Surely<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%>.

Now when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>, he <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>. But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>: and he sat <S%H3427>down<s%> by a <S%H875>well<s%>.

Now the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> had <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%>: and they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1802>drew<s%> <S%H4390>water<s%>, and filled the <S%H7298>troughs<s%> to <S%H8248>water<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6629>flock<s%>.

And the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and drove them <S%H1644>away<s%>; but <S%H4872>Moses<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H3467>helped<s%> <S%H8248>them<s%>, and watered their <S%H6629>flock<s%>.
And when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4069>How<s%> is it that ye are <S%H935>come<s%> so <S%H4116>soon<s%> <S%H3117>to-day<s%>?

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, An <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> us out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>, and moreover he <S%H1802>drew<s%> <S%H1802>water<s%> for <S%H8248>us<s%>, and watered the <S%H6629>flock<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, And where is <S%H5800>he<s%>? Why is it that ye have left the <S%H376>man<s%>? <S%H7121>Call<s%> <S%H398>him<s%>, that he may eat <S%H3899>bread<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H2974>content<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with the <S%H376>man<s%>: and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6855>Zipporah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%>.

And she <S%H3205>bare<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1647>Gershom<s%>; for he <S%H559>said<s%>, I have been a <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> in a <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>.

And it came to pass in the <S%H1992>course<s%> of those many <S%H3117>days<s%>, that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H584>sighed<s%> by reason <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5656>bondage<s%>, and they <S%H2199>cried<s%>, and their <S%H7775>cry<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> by reason of the <S%H5656>bondage<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H5009>groaning<s%>, and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, with <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and with <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H430>God<s%> took knowledge of <S%H3045>them<s%>.
